posts.post_content: Looking to purchase a T206 with Auto. Graded by psa or SGC is fine. Thanks.

[quote name="CrackaJackKid" post=1715125]Looking to purchase a T206 with Auto. Graded by psa or SGC is fine. Thanks.[/QUOTE]

Given that the going price for the worst signed beater is $1,000...

[url]http://goodwinandco.com/lot-36234.aspx[/url]

...you could do a lot worse than whatever you are able to negotiate from theshleps on Net54 for this Marquard:

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/1909-11-T206-Rube-Marquard-HANDS-AT-THIGHS-Sweet-Caporal-Autograph-Signed-/282705721224[/url]

Figure he is losing 13% through eBay, I’d send him a PM and see how it goes!
